item.title: About
item.description:
I enjoy building intelligent machinesâ€”from processors, circuits, and actuators to the math, algorithms, and software that govern them. I’m currently studying computer science and mathematics at Simon Fraser University.

Lately, I’ve been co-leading a new drone swarm research initiative at the Autonomous Intelligence and Robotics (AIRob) Lab. I’m also developing trajectory optimization and thrust vector control software at Simon Fraser University Rocketry.

Previously, I built Canada’s first autonomous robotic control system at National Research Council Canada for geochemical sensing and anomaly detection.
